title: Beef and bok choi noodles
description: Low in calories, this Asian dish of beef and bok choi noodles is also quick, simple, healthy and filling.
ingredients: 300g lean beef steak, such as sirloin or fillet, trimmed of all fat
4 small heads bok choi, cut into wide strips
Bunch spring onions, trimmed and cut on the diagonal into 1cm slices

method.Step 1: Bring a large pan of lightly salted water to the boil. Add the noodles and cook for 4 minutes, until just tender. Drain and set aside.

method.Step 2: Cut the steak into thin slices, about 2cm wide. Spread out on a plate and season. In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, oyster sauce, rice wine and vinegar. Set aside.

method.Step 3: Heat the oil in a wok or large, non-stick deep frying pan over a high heat. Add the steak and stir-fry for 1 minute, until just cooked. Lift out with a slotted spoon and set aside. Add the ginger, bok choi, spring onions and beansprouts. Stir-fry for 1 minute.

method.Step 4: Return the beef to the pan along with the noodles, soy and oyster sauce mixture and the toasted sesame oil. Briefly toss together, until heated through. Serve in warmed shallow bowls.
